## Gesture.onMoveWrapper\_ property

A handle to use to unbind a pointermove listener at the end of a drag. Opaque data returned from Blockly.bindEventWithChecks\_.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected onMoveWrapper_: browserEvents.Data | null;
```
